TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract SmartTagBase

summary.span: 在 Office Word 和 Excel 解决方案中定义智能标记的共享功能。

span.span: Defines shared functionality for smart tags in Office solutions for Word and Excel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的基接口和。 is the base interface for and . 若要为 Word 或 Excel 的 Office 解决方案中创建智能标记，使用`Globals.Factory.CreateSmartTag`方法来创建或对象。To create a smart tag in an Office solution for Word or Excel, use the `Globals.Factory.CreateSmartTag` method to create a or object. [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage 此类型旨在使用仅在项目中，适用于 Excel 2007 和 Word 2007。This type is intended to be used only in projects for Excel 2007 and Word 2007. Word 2010 和 Excel 2010 中已弃用智能标记。Smart tags are deprecated in Excel 2010 and Word 2010. [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

Docs.summary:
获取或设置一个由智能标记公开的操作的数组。
Gets or sets an array of actions that are exposed by the smart tag. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

value.span: 一个由智能标记公开的操作的数组。

span.span: An array of actions that are exposed by the smart tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为动态地将操作添加到的智能标记将会导致所有的智能标记中要重新加载的文档，必须预先确定，数组的大小。The size of the array must be predetermined, because dynamically adding actions to the smart tag would cause all the smart tags in the document to reload. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建，然后将添加到操作属性。The following code example creates a and then adds an action to the property. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供。This code example is part of a larger example provided for . [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/CS/Trin_ExcelSmartTags.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/VB/ThisWorkbook.vb#2)]

exception.span: 在将智能标记添加到 中之后设置此属性。

span.span: This property is set after the smart tag was added to a .

Docs.summary:
获取智能标记的名称。
Gets the name of the smart tag. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

span.span: The name of the smart tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 智能标记的名称显示在智能标记菜单的顶部。The name of the smart tag is displayed at the top of the smart tag menu. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. 事件处理程序使用属性来显示智能标记的名称。The event handler uses the property to display the name of the smart tag. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供。This code example is part of a larger example provided for . [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags#4](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags/CS/CustomSmartTag.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags#4](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags/VB/CustomSmartTag.vb#4)]

Docs.summary:
获取智能标记将识别的正则表达式的集合。
Gets the collection of regular expressions that the smart tag will recognize. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

value.span: 获取一个 ，它包含智能标记将识别的正则表达式。

span.span: Gets a that contains the regular expressions that the smart tag will recognize.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法将正则表达式添加到组的智能标记将识别的正则表达式。Use the method to add a regular expression to the set of regular expressions that the smart tag will recognize. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建，然后使用要添加的正则表达式属性"[我 | 我] ssue\s\d {5，6}"到的智能标记识别的正则表达式的集合。The following code example creates a and then uses the property to add the regular expression "[I|i]ssue\s\d{5,6}" to the collection of regular expressions that the smart tag recognizes. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供。This code example is part of a larger example provided for . [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/CS/Trin_ExcelSmartTags.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/VB/ThisWorkbook.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Remove(class System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex regex) cil managed

param.name: regex
param.span: 一个正则表达式，它定义要在文档中搜索的术语。

span.span: A regular expression that is used to define the term to be searched for in the document.

Docs.summary:
从智能标记中移除正则表达式识别器。
Removes a regular expression recognizer from the smart tag. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

获取充当智能标记唯一标识符的命名空间。
Gets a namespace that acts as a unique identifier for the smart tag. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

value.span: 充当智能标记唯一标识符的命名空间。

span.span: A namespace that acts as a unique identifier for the smart tag.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个智能标记类型定义由命名空间，以便其标识为唯一。Each smart tag type is defined by a namespace so that its identity is unique. 命名空间是一个 XML 构造，用于唯一地标识一组属于逻辑类别的 XML 标记。A namespace is an XML construct for uniquely identifying a group of XML tags that belong to a logical category. 命名空间将分组在一起，以便轻松属性发现相关的属性，并更重要的是，要保持属性名称唯一。A namespace groups related properties together for easy property discovery and, more importantly, to keep the property names unique. 属性名称是通过组合命名空间统一资源标识符 (URI) 和标记名称构成。Property names are constructed by combining the namespace Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) and the tag name. 换而言之，属性名称组成命名空间 URI 和命名空间 URI 的标记名称。In other words, property names are composed of a namespace URI and a tag name of the namespace URI. 同样，智能标记类型由唯一的命名空间 URI 和标记名称定义。Similarly, smart tag types are defined by a unique namespace URI plus the tag name. 数字符号 （#） 附加到的命名空间 URI，并用于分隔的命名空间 URI 从其标记名称。A number sign (#) is appended to the namespace URI and is used to separate the namespace URI from its tag name. 将为以下格式： namespaceURI #tagnameThe format is as follows: namespaceURI#tagname 智能标记类型的一个示例是 urn： 架构-contoso-com:finance #StockTickerSymbol。An example of a smart tag type is urn:schemas-contoso-com:finance#StockTickerSymbol. 在这里，命名空间 URI 是 urn： 架构-contoso-com:finance，与 StockTickerSymbol 作为标记名称。Here, the namespace URI is urn:schemas-contoso-com:finance, with StockTickerSymbol as the tag name. 它们合并以形成的属性，在这种情况下为是智能标记类型的完全限定的名称。They are combined to form a fully qualified name of the property, which in this case is a smart tag type. 智能标记类型是完全限定的 XML 标记的说明。A smart tag type is a fully qualified description of an XML tag. 因此，由其标记名称除了其命名空间唯一标识每个智能标记类型。Therefore, every smart tag type is uniquely identified by its tag name in addition to its namespace. 属性名称的 URI 部分可确保它是唯一而明确。The URI portion of the property name ensures that it is unique and unambiguous. 可以使用命名空间加以区分具有相同的标记名称的两个属性。Two properties with the same tag name can be differentiated using namespaces. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的处理程序事件。The following code example demonstrates a handler for the event. 事件处理程序使用属性来显示智能标记的唯一的命名空间标识符。The event handler uses the property to display the unique namespace identifier of the smart tag. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供。This code example is part of a larger example provided for . [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags#4](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags/CS/CustomSmartTag.cs#4)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags#4](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelDerivedSmartTags/VB/CustomSmartTag.vb#4)]

Docs.summary:
获取智能标记将识别的字符串的集合。
Gets the collection of string literals that the smart tag will recognize. [!INCLUDE[vsto_smart_tags](~/includes/vsto-smart-tags-md.md)]。.

value.span: 获取一个 ，它包含智能标记将识别的字符串。

span.span: Gets a that contains the string literals that the smart tag will recognize.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法将字符串添加到组的智能标记将识别的条款。Use the method to add a string literal to the set of terms that the smart tag will recognize. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建，然后使用属性来添加单词"`sale`"到的智能标记识别的条款的集合。The following code example creates a and then uses the property to add the word "`sale`" to the collection of terms that the smart tag recognizes. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供。This code example is part of a larger example provided for . [!code-csharp[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/CS/Trin_ExcelSmartTags.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_ExcelSmartTags#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_ExcelSmartTags/VB/ThisWorkbook.vb#2)]
